definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of gallium salts on bone metabolism in osteoporosis rats caused by tretinoin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究镓盐对维甲酸致骨质疏松大鼠骨代谢的影响。

sentences.english: They turned out to be the undiscovered elements scandium, gallium, technetium and germanium.
sentences.chinese: 那时还没发现的元素就是钪，镓，锗和锝。

sentences.english: Indium, boron and gallium are used in making solar cells.
sentences.chinese: 铟，镓，硼，应用到太阳能电池中。

sentences.english: To investigate the effect of gallium on the bone lamellar structure of osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 探讨镓盐对大鼠骨质疏松骨组织板层结构的影响。

sentences.english: Two of them are in the top four commercial GaN companies.
sentences.chinese: 其中两个是在四大商业氮化镓的公司。

sentences.english: Moreover, gallium arsenide is much more expensive than silicon in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 另外，最重要的是，镓砷化物比硅贵得多。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gallium can alleviate the damage of osteocyte ultrastructure elicited by osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨镓盐对骨质疏松骨细胞超微结构的影响。

sentences.english: The material is a semiconductor called gallium manganese arsenide.
sentences.chinese: 这种材料是一种叫做镓锰砷化物的东东。

sentences.english: Objective to investigate the influence of gallium on osteocyte ultrastructure in osteoporosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨镓盐对骨质疏松骨细胞超微结构的影响。
